Unchained dVPN is an extension for fast and trustless access to any website.
Bypass any country, company, or school restrictions with Unchained dVPN. 
Unchained is free and user-friendly!

Simply add to Chrome and start exploring. 
Unchained dVPN operates on top of a fully decentralized server network to give you access to websites blocked or censored in your country. 
___________________________
Currently we have servers in the USA. More coming soon!
